name: exercise-diary
description: ExerciseDiary is a simple fitness tracking app for logging workouts, exercises, and progress over time. It runs as a self-hosted web app, giving users privacy over their health data while providing charts and summaries.
features: Workout Logging: Record exercises and training sessions. Comprehensive fitness tracking.
Progress Charts: Visualize improvements over time. Data-driven motivation.
Exercise Library: Track various workout types. Flexible activity logging.
Personal Records: Monitor strength and endurance gains. Celebrate achievements.
Privacy-Focused: Keep health data on your server. Complete fitness privacy.
Self-Hosted: Own your workout data completely. Your fitness, your control.
